SEARCH
Package service

Klasse Strategy

java.lang.Object
service.Strategy
Bekannte direkte Unterklassen:
Attack, Consolidation, Defensive, EmptyMove, Expansion, FallBack, MixedStrategy
public abstract class Strategy extends Object
Abstract class, which declares the methods that are common to all strategies and some utility methods (static).

  • Konstruktorübersicht

    Konstruktoren
    Konstruktor
    Beschreibung
    Strategy(Notes notes)
    Initializes a strategy with the notes from the previous round.

  • Methodenübersicht

    Modifizierer und Typ
    Methode
    Beschreibung
    void
    distributeUnused(Ring ring, Output output)
    Distributes all unused fernies first on uncontrolled nodes, and, if they were all full, on the agent's nodes.
    abstract Output
    move(Ring ring)
    Executes the given strategy.
    void
    removeAll(Ring ring, Output output)
    Removes all fernies from all nodes owned by the agent.
    void
    removeUnnecessary(Ring ring, Output output)
    Leaves on every node owned by the agent only 1 fernie (to hold the node for obtaining the bonus for nodes controlled) and removes the remaining fernies to maximize the available fernie number for the current round.

    Von Klasse geerbte Methoden java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • move

      public abstract Output move(Ring ring)
      Executes the given strategy. Returns the output to be written in the move file.
      Parameter:
      ring - the ring
      Gibt zurück:
      output

    • distributeUnused

      public void distributeUnused(Ring ring, Output output)
      Distributes all unused fernies first on uncontrolled nodes, and, if they were all full, on the agent's nodes.
      Parameter:
      ring - current status of the ring
      output - output so far

    • removeUnnecessary

      public void removeUnnecessary(Ring ring, Output output)
      Leaves on every node owned by the agent only 1 fernie (to hold the node for obtaining the bonus for nodes controlled) and removes the remaining fernies to maximize the available fernie number for the current round.
      Parameter:
      ring - ring
      output - output
